subject: design-qa.spec.js Categories 1-5 ready for review
body:
FF — Categories 1-5 of design-qa.spec.js committed (38583ce).

46 tests across 5 categories testing RENDERED OUTPUT (getComputedStyle), not CSS source:
- Cat 1: Visual consistency — fonts, titles, viewport, console errors
- Cat 2: Navigation — back links, position consistency
- Cat 3: Responsive — 375px no-scroll, 44px touch targets (WCAG 2.5.8)
- Cat 4: Arena mode — toggle exists, body class applied
- Cat 5: Error states — exam.html no-param/bad-param handling

Results: 34/46 pass, 12 real findings:
1. 3 pages wrong title (not 'Motor City Math')
2. 20 distinct font sizes (4 outliers beyond approved 6-size scale)
3. final_exam_251123 horizontal scroll at 375px
4. 5 pages touch targets < 44px (arena toggle 36x36px, dashboard link 16px tall)
5. 2 pages arena toggle doesn't add body class after click

Key design decisions:
- Auto-discovers HTML files (no hardcoded list) — scales as pages are added
- Excludes KaTeX/MathJax from font checks (math SHOULD use KaTeX fonts)
- Excludes sr-only/skip links from touch target checks (a11y pattern)
- Uses local HTTP server (port 8349) for Playwright

Ready for your review. Category 6 (screenshot baseline) is next.
